exercise.instructions:
1. Locate the EXOBJ_ResetStatus() function. Before the return statement:
    Add the logic from the exercise window to set the ExObj->CounterValue reset value

1. Locate the CFE_EVS_SendEvent() call in the EXOBJ_Execute() function:
    Change the event type from 'CFE_EVS_EventType_INFORMATION' to 'CFE_EVS_EventType_DEBUG'

1. Locate the 'DataTypeSet: Telemetry Payloads' comment block. In 'StatusTlm_Payload':
    Change CounterMode type from 'BASE_TYPES/uint16' to 'CounterMode'

Note the GUI needs to be restarted after building the new lesson cFS target.
